content: oma leni s mittens -­ chunky by gralinaknits these are classic plain well fitting and warm mittens knit up in the wonderful alafosslopi and using large needles this is a quick knit you can easily finish a pair in a day size s m and l finished measurements width over palm x length from wrist to tip s 9 cm/3 5 x 24 5 cm/9 5 m 10 cm/4 x 25 cm/10 l 11 5cm/4 5 x 30cm/12 yarn suggestions 1 skein of istex alafosslopi 100g 100m/109yrd in 0056 gray yardage 100m/109yrd needles us 7 4 5 mm circle needles for the ribbing and us 9 5 5 mm circle needles using magic loop and us 9 5 5 mm dpn needles for the thumb notions tapestry needle stitch markers stitch holder gauge 14 sts and 19 rounds in stockinette sts using us 9 -­ 5 5mm needles = 10cm/4 note that you ll be knitting a fabric that is slightly tighter than yarn calls for the ribbing and palm is knit using magic loop the thumb using 3 dpn needles if you prefer dpn s for your mittens please divide evenly and follow the pattern abbreviations k=knit p=purl k2tog=knit 2 sts together knitwise skpo=slip1 knit1 and pass slipped stitch over m1r=make 1 right-­ leaning-­ stitch by picking up the loop between 2 sts with the left needle from the back knit loop twisted as if to knit m1l=make 1 left-­ leaning-­ stitch by picking up the loop between 2 sts with the left needle from the front knit loop twisted through back loop pm=place marker sl m=slip marker pattern cast on 26 28 34 join stitches without twisting and pm so you know the beginning of your round bor work a magic loop work in 1x1 rib k1 p1 for 7 7 9 cm/2¾ 2¾ 3 5 change to larger needles next 2 rounds k all place a second stitch marker after 13 14 17 sts now shape thumb gore and simultaneously increase 1 st for the upper side of the palm right mitten next round sl m k1 m1r k1 m1l k to m slm k4 m1l k to end next 2 rounds k all next round sl m k1 m1r k3 m1l k to end next 2 rounds k all repeat increasing for thumb like this adding 1 stitch on each side of the thumb gore on every 3rd round for a total of 4 4 5 times = 9 9 11 thumb sts after the last increase round proceed directly to shape palm shape palm next round k 1 slip the 9 9 11 thumb stitches on
